<answer>The search results reveal that Emma Johnson has a vacation planned in Hawaii from June 10th to June 20th, 2024. The itinerary includes various activities such as a beach day at Waikiki Beach, snorkeling at Hanauma Bay, hiking at Diamond Head, a visit to Pearl Harbor, a road trip to the North Shore, a luau experience at Polynesian Cultural Center, relaxation day at the hotel spa, kayaking at Kailua Beach, and shopping at Ala Moana Center. The packing list includes swimwear, sunscreen, hiking gear, casual outfits, camera, and travel documents.</answer>
